mapper.sql: id, lift_id, device_no, driver, device_time, weight, height, speed, people, front_door_status, back_door_status, status, tilt_angle, floor, floor_start, floor_end, key1, key2, key3, key4, key5, key6, key7, key8, key9, key10, is_del, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user,

${alias}.id AS ${alias}_id, ${alias}.lift_id AS ${alias}_lift_id, ${alias}.device_no AS ${alias}_device_no, ${alias}.driver AS ${alias}_driver, ${alias}.device_time AS ${alias}_device_time, ${alias}.weight AS ${alias}_weight, ${alias}.height AS ${alias}_height, ${alias}.speed AS ${alias}_speed, ${alias}.people AS ${alias}_people, ${alias}.front_door_status AS ${alias}_front_door_status, ${alias}.back_door_status AS ${alias}_back_door_status, ${alias}.status AS ${alias}_status, ${alias}.tilt_angle AS ${alias}_tilt_angle, ${alias}.floor AS ${alias}_floor, ${alias}.floor_start AS ${alias}_floor_start, ${alias}.floor_end AS ${alias}_floor_end, ${alias}.key1 AS ${alias}_key1, ${alias}.key2 AS ${alias}_key2, ${alias}.key3 AS ${alias}_key3, ${alias}.key4 AS ${alias}_key4, ${alias}.key5 AS ${alias}_key5, ${alias}.key6 AS ${alias}_key6, ${alias}.key7 AS ${alias}_key7, ${alias}.key8 AS ${alias}_key8, ${alias}.key9 AS ${alias}_key9, ${alias}.key10 AS ${alias}_key10, ${alias}.is_del AS ${alias}_is_del, ${alias}.create_time AS ${alias}_create_time, ${alias}.create_user AS ${alias}_create_user, ${alias}.modify_time AS ${alias}_modify_time, ${alias}.modify_user AS ${alias}_modify_user,
mapper.select:
select m.deviceNo,m.deviceTime,m.weight,m.height,m.speed,m.frontDoorStatus,m.backDoorStatus ,m.status, lift.identifier,lift.manufactor,lift.owner from (
SELECT device_no as deviceNo, device_time as deviceTime, weight as weight, height as height, speed as speed, case front_door_status when 0 then '关闭' when 1 then '开启' end as frontDoorStatus , case back_door_status when 0 then '关闭' when 1 then '开启' end as backDoorStatus, '在线' as status, lift_id liftId FROM t_project_lift_detail_${month} where
is_del = 0 and lift_id = ( select id from t_project_lift where device_no = #{deviceNo} and project_id = ( select id from t_project_info where uuid = #{uuid} ) ) order by device_time limit 1
) m left join t_project_lift lift on lift.id = m.liftId
order by deviceTime

SELECT ${columnName} as name, min(concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),if(floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}=0,'00',floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}),':00')) AS time
FROM ${tableName} where lift_id=#{id} and device_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00' ) - interval #{total} minute GROUP BY concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step},':00')
union all SELECT ${columnName} as name, min(concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),if(floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}=0,'00',floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}),':00')) AS time
FROM ${tableName1} where lift_id=#{id} and device_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00' ) - interval #{total} minute GROUP BY concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step},':00')

SELECT ${columnName} as name, min(concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),if(floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}=0,'00',floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}),':00')) AS time
FROM ${tableName} where lift_id=#{id} and DATE_FORMAT(device_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step},':00')
union all SELECT ${columnName} as name, min(concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),if(floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}=0,'00',floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step}),':00')) AS time FROM ${tableName1} where lift_id=#{id} and DATE_FORMAT(device_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY concat(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:'),floor(DATE_FORMAT(device_time, '%i')/#{step})*#{step},':00')
